0385.HK.summary: Chinney Alliance Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the trading of plastic and chemical products, and building related contracting activities. It operates through five segments: Plastic and Chemical Products, Building Related Contracting Services, Building Construction, Foundation Piling and Ground Investigation, and Others. The company offers building related contracting services, including engineering contracting services in the air-conditioning industry and maintenance services; superstructure construction work services; and foundation piling, and drilling and site investigation services. It is also involved in contracting of building aluminum works; the distribution and installation of aviation systems and other hi-tech products, as well as mechanical, electrical, and building supplies; trading of electrical, air-conditioning, and other building supply products; and maintenance of air-conditioning, electrical generators, water pumps, and fire prevention and fighting systems. In addition, the company trades in building decoration materials, generators, and electrical and mechanical engineering materials and equipment; and holds properties and investments. Further, it is involved in the treasury functions; basement construction works; agency trading of industrial products; equipment and machinery leasing; construction material testing; design, installation, repair, and maintenance of electrical and mechanical systems; trading of electrical installation products; provision of management services; and installation of air-conditioning systems. It primarily serves public and private sectors in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Macau, and Singapore. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0406.HK.summary: Yau Lee Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong, Macau, Singapore, and Mainland China. It operates in Construction, Electrical and Mechanical Installation, Building Materials Supply, Property Investment and Development, and Hotel Operations segments. The company contracts for various private developers and government institutions; and constructs resorts, hotels, and residential buildings. It also provides architectural and engineering, theme painting, curtain wall and steel work, plumbing and drainage, GRC, GRG, GRP, and construction IT services, as well as pre-fabricated products. In addition, the company offers construction IT services, including software development, project management, system development, and integration and IT outsourcing services. Further, it trades in construction and building materials; provides a range of import/export services, such as applying for certificate of origin and 3C, cargo insurance agency, prepayment of import/export tax and charges, etc.; and invests in, develops, and operates residential, commercial, and industrial properties. Additionally, the company offers building information modeling, and other virtual design and construction; electrical, mechanical, ventilation and air conditioning, fire, plumbing, and environmental engineering; energy optimization and environmental protection; water treatment; project management and consultancy; hotel management; patent licensing; and training services. It is also involved in the design, installation, maintenance, renovation, and fitting-out of buildings; environmental protection related software and programming activities; manufacture and sale of precast products and building materials; distribution of books; and trading of environmental technology products. Yau Lee Holdings Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

0498.HK.summary: PYI Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, develops and invests in ports and infrastructure in the Yangtze River region of the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company operates through Paul Y. Engineering Group, Ports Development, Ports and Logistics, Property, Securities, and Treasury segments. The Paul Y. Engineering Group segment is involved in building construction, civil engineering, development and project management, facilities and asset management, and property investment activities. The Ports Development segment develops ports facilities and ports related properties. The Ports and Logistics segment owns and operates ports and logistics facilities in the Yangtze River region of China; liquefied petroleum gas terminals and storage-tank farm; and automotive compressed natural gas fueling stations. The Property segment develops, invests, sells, and leases real estate properties and developed lands, and land and projects under development. The Securities segment invests and trades in securities. The Treasury segment provides credit and cash management services. PYI Corporation Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

0687.HK.summary: Tysan Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the foundation piling and site investigation, property development and investment, and investment activities in the People's Republic of China. It offers foundation piling services, including bored piling, driven piling, socketed H-piling, mini piling, preboring, pile cap, basement construction, diaphragm wall, and shoring services, as well as undertakes footing, ground investigation field, site formation, demolition, landslip preventive and slope, road and drainage, and minor building works. The company also trades in and leases various tower cranes; develops and invests in various commercial and residential properties; and offers property management services consisting of tenancy management, security, concierge and value-added, fire consultancy and risk assessment, repair and maintenance, cleaning, environmental protection, hygiene and safety management, landscape management, car park management, and clubhouse management services. In addition, it offers project management and consultancy services; corporate financing, engineering, and machinery hiring and trading services. The company was formerly known as Hong Kong International Construction Investment Management Group Co., Limited and changed its name to Tysan Holdings Limited in August 2019. Tysan Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

0784.HK.summary: Ling Yui Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation engineering services in Hong Kong. It offers foundation works, including excavation and lateral support works, pile cap and pile construction, and site formation works, as well as road and drainage works for foundation projects in the private sector. Ling Yui Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in San Po Kong, Hong Kong.

0896.HK.summary: Hanison Construction Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong. It operates through seven segments: Construction; Interior and Renovation Works; Design, Supply and Installation of Building Materials; Sale of Health Products; Property Investment; Property Development; and Provision of Property Agency and Management Services. The company operates as a builder for residential, commercial, and industrial properties, as well as educational and recreational facilities; and provides design-and-build services. It is also involved in supplying and installing building materials, such as kitchen cabinets, timber flooring, engineering flooring, suspended ceiling systems, firex boards, and poly boards to developers and main contractors; and supplying plumbing pipes and tubes, fittings, and other related accessories, including galvanized pipes, black pipes, stainless steel pipes and tubes, and polyethylene pipes. In addition, the company engages in the maintenance and renovation of clubhouses, shopping arcades, office premises, residential properties, industrial buildings, and institutional facilities; and property/project development consisting of land acquisition/feasibility study, design, construction, sales, and marketing services. Further, it provides property agency and management services, such as property management, rental collection, agency, and leasing services; and sells health supplements, health care equipment, and traditional Chinese medicine. Additionally, the company provides plant maintenance services. It operates three retail outlets under the HealthPlus name and one services center. Hanison Construction Holdings Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong.

1034.HK.summary: Fullwealth Construction Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the civil engineering and building works in Hong Kong. It undertakes various civil engineering works, such as site formation, and excavation and lateral support and pile cap construction works; and roads and drainage and waterworks, as well as alteration and addition works. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yuen Long, Hong Kong.

1315.HK.summary: Vision Fame International Holding Limited engages in the construction activities in Hong Kong, Singapore, and the People's Republic of China. It provides building construction and property maintenance services; undertakes alteration, renovation, upgradation, and fitting-out works; and offers management services. It also produces graphene; trades in materials, such as iron ores, cast iron, and coal; and offers foundation works. Vision Fame International Holding Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central and Western, Hong Kong.

1372.HK.summary: Bisu Technology Group International Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the development, production, and sale of automotive engines in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company operates in two segments, Automotive Engines, and Civil Engineering and Construction. It is also involved in the provision of civil engineering, and building construction and maintenance works; and leasing of equipment for construction works. The company was formerly known as Excel Development (Holdings) Limited and changed its name to Bisu Technology Group International Limited in February 2017. Bisu Technology Group International Limited was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Bisu Technology Group International Limited is a subsidiary of Youth Force Asia Ltd.

1429.HK.summary: Skymission Group Holdings Limited operates as a formwork works subcontractor in Hong Kong. The company offers its services to construction companies operating in public and private sector construction works. The company was formerly known as Skymission (Global) Group Holdings Limited. Skymission Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yuen Long, Hong Kong. Skymission Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Sky Mission Group Limited.

1447.HK.summary: SFK Construction Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and maintenance of building and civil engineering projects primarily in Hong Kong. It operates through three segments: General Building, Civil Engineering, and Others. The company undertakes construction projects in Macau under the SFK brand. It also offers engineering services for substructure or superstructure of building structures and infrastructure facilities; and maintenance, repair, addition, and alteration services to building structures and infrastructure facilities, as well as undertakes road construction works. In addition, the company provides housing and property management services, such as cleaning and security management, and building information modeling services, as well as electrical and mechanical engineering, and consultancy services. It serves customers in the public and private sectors. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. SFK Construction Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Sun Fook Kong Group Limited.

1472.HK.summary: Sang Hing Holdings (International) Limited, an investment holding company, provides civil and engineering, and related services in Hong Kong. It undertakes site formation, road and bridge construction, drainage and sewerage construction, water main installation, and slope works. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Tuen Mun, Hong Kong.

1499.HK.summary: OKG Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation works and ancillary services in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Foundation Works and Ancillary Services, Construction Wastes Handling, Technology Services, Money Lending, and Investments in Securities segments. It provides site formation, excavation and lateral support, piling construction, pile caps or footing construction, and reinforced concrete structure works; and ancillary services, such as hoarding and demolition works, as well as leases machinery. The company also operates and manages public fill reception facilities, including public fill banks and temporary construction waste sorting facilities for construction and demolition materials; invests in securities; and lends money. In addition, it develops and manages USDK smart contract, as well as offers technology development and I.T. infrastructure services; project management; trust and company services; and internet content and valued-added telecommunications services. The company was formerly known as LEAP Holdings Group Limited and changed its name to OKG Technology Holdings Limited in February 2020. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. OKG Technology Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of OKC Holdings Corporation.

1546.HK.summary: Thelloy Development Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides building construction services primarily in Hong Kong. The company also offers repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition work services; and design and build services, as well as operates as a contractor for public works. It principally serves government, quasi-government organizations, universities, schools, institutions, and incorporated owners of private buildings. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Thelloy Development Group Limited is a subsidiary of Cheers Mate Holding Limited.

1556.HK.summary: Chinney Kin Wing Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in foundation construction and drilling, and site investigation works for public and private sectors in Hong Kong and internationally. It operates in two segments, Foundation Construction and Ancillary Services; and Drilling and Site Investigation. The company offers piling construction services, such as bored piling, percussive H-piling, socketed H-piling, mini-piling, and sheet piling; other ancillary services comprising ELS works, site formation, and pile cap construction; and drilling and site investigation, and related ground engineering construction services. It also offers equipment and machinery leasing and construction material testing services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Chinney Kin Wing Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Chinney Alliance Group Limited.

1559.HK.summary: Kwan On Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and maintenance works on civil engineering contracts in Hong Kong and Southeast Asia. It operates in two segments, Construction and Property Development. The company undertakes works related to buildings, waterworks, site formation, roads, drainage, and slopes upgrading services. It also engages in the provision of contracting work on civil plumbing, fire protection, insulation, concrete repair, and related activities; property holding activities; and construction site workmen services, as well as the trade of diesel. In addition, the company develops properties; and sells residential and commercial units, as well as car parking spaces. Kwan On Holdings Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

1630.HK.summary: Kin Shing Holdings Limited engages in erecting formworks for construction works in private residential and commercial buildings primarily in Hong Kong. The company primarily provides timber formworks by using timber and plywood; and metal formwork system by using aluminum and other metals. It also engages in building construction works; and securities investment business. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Kin Shing Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Five Continental Enterprise Limited.

1633.HK.summary: Sheung Yue Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation services to private and public sectors in Hong Kong and Macau. Its foundation works include piling construction, ELS works, pile cap construction, and site formation, as well as provides ancillary services, including loading test and construction machinery leasing services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Sheung Yue Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Creative Elite Global Limited.

1662.HK.summary: Yee Hop Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering and construction services for private and public sectors in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and the Philippines. It operates through Foundation and Other Civil Works; Tunneling Works; and Breeding, Sales and Trading of Aquatic Products segments. Its foundation works include construction of mini-piles, rock-socketed steel H-piles, and driven steel H piles, as well as other civil works, such as site formation works, and road and pavement works; and tunneling works comprise pipe jacking, hand dig tunnel, and cut-and-cover tunnel works. The company is also involved in the research and development, breeding, sale, and trading of aquatic products; and provision of laboratory test services. Yee Hop Holdings Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

1707.HK.summary: Geotech Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, provides construction and engineering services, and property-related services in Hong Kong. It undertakes slope works and ground investigation field works as a contractor and subcontractor. The company undertakes landslip preventive/remedial works to slopes/retaining walls; site formation works; general civil works, including road drainage and sewer, geotechnical, and ground investigation field works; and metal scaffolding works. It also provides property management consultancy services to property owners. The company serves government departments, railway operators, property owners and developers, and professional consultants. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Geotech Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Star Merit Global Limited.

1751.HK.summary: Kingland Group Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides concrete demolition services in Hong Kong and Macau as a subcontractor. The company removes pieces or sections of concrete from concrete structures; and demolishes concrete structures or buildings through core drilling, sawing, and crushing. Its services are used in various areas, including addition and alteration works, and redevelopment projects in buildings, roads, tunnels, and underground facilities. The company was formerly known as Sing On Holdings Limited and changed its name to Kingland Group Holdings Limited in September 2018. Kingland Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. Kingland Group Holdings Limited was formerly a subsidiary of CSI Properties Limited.

1757.HK.summary: Affluent Foundation Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides services related to foundation works in Hong Kong. It offers excavation and lateral support, and pile caps construction services; and other services, such as demolition works, underground drainage works, earthworks, and structural steel works. The company also leases machinery to other construction companies. It serves construction work companies engaged in public and/or private construction projects. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. Affluent Foundation Holdings Limited is a subsidiary Oriental Castle Group Limited.

1783.HK.summary: Golden Ponder Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides superstructure building and repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition (RMAA) works services as a contractor in Hong Kong. Its superstructure building works include building works in relation to the parts of the structure above the ground level primarily development projects for residential and commercial buildings; and RMAA works comprise repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition works for existing structures. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Golden Ponder Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Shiny Golden Limited.

1793.HK.summary: Wecon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a construction contractor in Hong Kong. The company operates in two segments, Construction Contracts; and Repair, Maintenance, Alteration and Addition (RMAA) Works Services. It offers building construction services for residential, commercial, and industrial buildings; RMAA works services, such as general upkeep, maintenance, improvement, refurbishment, alteration, and addition of existing facilities and components of buildings and their surroundings. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

1870.HK.summary: Acme International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides design and build solutions for faÃ§ade and building maintenance unit (BMU) system works in Hong Kong. Its activities include design, preparation of shop drawings and structural calculations, procurement of building materials and BMU systems, installation and logistics arrangement services, on-site project supervision, post-completion maintenance services, project management, and post-completion repair and maintenance. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

1920.HK.summary: Hands Form Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a subcontractor in Hong Kong. The company undertakes wet trades' works, including plastering on floors, walls, and ceilings; tile laying on internal and external walls and floors; brick laying; and laying of marble tiles to the floor. It also provides other wet trades related ancillary works, such as touch-ups, chiseling, smoothing, cleaning, applying sealant, washed granolithic screed, on-site logistics services, etc. The company primarily serves main contractors and subcontractors of various building construction projects; governments; and property developers. Hands Form Holdings Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong.

1977.HK.summary: Analogue Holdings Limited provides electrical and mechanical (E&M) engineering services in Hong Kong and internationally. It operates through four segments: Building Services; Environmental Engineering; Information, Communications, and Building Technology (ICBT); and Lift and Escalators. The Building Services segment electrical and mechanical engineering building services, including the design, installation, testing and commissioning, and maintenance of heating, ventilation and air-conditioning system; fire service system; plumbing and drainage system; and electrical and extra low voltage system. The Environmental Engineering segment is involved in the design, construction, operation, and maintenance of environmental engineering systems for the treatment of sewage, water, solid waste, sludge, and gas. The ICBT segment engages in the design, hardware and software development, installation, and maintenance of infrastructure communications, and security and access systems. This segment offers solutions for smart building technologies, comprising energy optimization, air conditioning, intelligent control and automation, security and extra low voltage, architectural and LED lighting, renewable energy, and ICT and the Internet of Things. The Lift and Escalators segment designs, supplies, installs, repairs, and maintains a range lifts escalators, and walkaways. The company serves banking, property development, education, entertainment, hospitality, information technology, data centers, transportation, and utilities sectors. Analogue Holdings Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. Analogue Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Arling Investment Limited.

2110.HK.summary: Yue Kan Holdings Ltd. operates as a marine construction works subcontractor in Hong Kong. Its marine construction works include reclamation works; regulation and deposition of sand blanket works; submarine pipeline works; and sediment treatment works. The company also provides vessel chartering services; and other civil engineering works comprising foundation works, site formation works, and roads and drainage works. It serves main contractors engaged by property developers or project employers in the public and private sectors. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong.

2132.HK.summary: Landrich Holding Limited undertakes construction works in Hong Kong. It is involved in the construction of trunk roads, carriageways, bridges, and tunnels, as well as modification of existing roads that include landscaping works, laying of pipes, and manhole construction. The company also engages in the clearance of construction site, demolition of existing structures, reduction and stabilization of existing slopes, and associated work; and establishment of fill tank for the storage of public fill materials arising from construction activities. In addition, it is involved in the construction of buildings, primarily structural steel works, and transportation and heavy lifting works, as well as construction of reinforced concrete structures. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

2262.HK.summary: Steve Leung Design Group Limited provides interior design services in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. It operates through Interior Design Services, Interior Decorating and Furnishing Services, and Product Design Services segments. The company offers interior design, and decorating and furnishing services for residential projects, including show flats, sales offices, standard provisions, and club houses; private residence projects consisting of apartments, penthouses, and villas; and hospitality projects comprising restaurants, hotels, serviced apartments, and shopping malls, as well as commercial projects, such as office premises. It also trades in interior decorative products, as well as license arrangement of interior design services and product design services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Steve Leung Design Group Limited is a subsidiary of Eagle Vision Development Limited.

3728.HK.summary: Ching Lee Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of construction, consultancy, and project management services in Hong Kong. The company undertakes substructure building works; superstructure building works; and repair, maintenance, alteration, and addition works. It is also involved in property holding activities. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jordan, Hong Kong. Ching Lee Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of JT Glory Limited.

3878.HK.summary: Vicon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation works and related services in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes piling construction, ELS, and pile cap construction works, as well as general building works. It serves property developers, and project owners and their contractors, as well as public sectors. Vicon Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong.

6063.HK.summary: Lotus Horizon Holdings Limited provides design, supply, and installation services for facade works and building metal finishing works in Hong Kong. It also offers window fabrication and installation services. The company offers its services for commercial properties, residential properties, and public facilities. It serves contractors and property developers. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Sha Tin, Hong Kong. Lotus Horizon Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Platinum Lotus Holdings Limited.

6182.HK.summary: Twintek Investment Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the sale of building materials; and provision of construction and engineering services in Hong Kong. The company operates through Sales of Building Materials and Construction Contracts segments. Its products include interior wall-fill materials comprising gypsum block products; timber flooring; roof tiles; and woodwork products. It primarily serves contractors. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Quarry Bay, Hong Kong. Twintek Investment Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Helios Enterprise Holding Limited.

6829.HK.summary: Dragon Rise Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, undertakes foundation works as a subcontractor in Hong Kong. The company's activities include excavation and lateral support works, and pile cap construction works; and disposal of excavated materials from piling. It also provides ancillary services, including dismantling of shoring, site formation, steel fixing, and site clearance; and trades in construction materials. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong. Dragon Rise Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Fame Circle Limited.

8021.HK.summary: WLS Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides scaffolding and fitting out, and other auxiliary services for the construction and building works businesses in Hong Kong. It operates in four segments: Scaffolding, Fitting Out and Other Auxiliary Services for Construction and Buildings Work; Money Lending Business; Securities Investment Business; and Assets Management Business. The company offers various scaffolding services, including metal-bamboo matrix system scaffold, bamboo scaffold, steel/ Pik Lik scaffold, and lift-shaft scaffold. It also provides permanent gondola services, such as building maintenance unit and permanent access platform; temporary gondola services; and gondolas rental services. In addition, the company offers false ceiling and fitting out services; glass fiber reinforced concrete, glass reinforced plastic, signages, artworks, and stamping concrete solutions; and transportation, management, and consultancy services. Further, it engages in the property holding, and money lending businesses; design, sale, trade, repair, and maintenance of gondolas and parapet railings; and installation and maintenance of access equipment. Additionally, the company provides securities investment, assets management, and management contracting services. WLS Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Aberdeen, Hong Kong.

8023.HK.summary: Kwong Man Kee Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering services to the car park flooring industry in Hong Kong. The company offers flooring services, including application of proprietary floor coating products for providing a colorful, slip-resistance, and hard wearing surface that is resistant against water and petrochemicals; and ancillary services comprising specialized texture painting and waterproofing works. It also offers screeding and anti-skid surfacing services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Kwong Man Kee Group Limited is a subsidiary of Sage City Investments Limited.

8039.HK.summary: KNK Holdings Limited provides architectural and structural engineering consultancy services in Hong Kong. Its services include licensing consultancy; alteration and addition works and minor works consultancy; inspection and certification; and other architecture related consultancy. KNK Holdings Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

8059.HK.summary: Glory Flame Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of construction works and building materials supply activities in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. It offers concrete demolition and construction engineering services; undertakes construction works; and provides concrete coring, wall sawing and diamond wire cutting, and bridge and road saw cutting, as well as demolition through hydraulic crusher and burster, grouting and bar fixing, and various demolition robots. The company also trades in clean coal and others, and ecological LED cultivation cabinet systems. In addition, it is involved in the research and sale of LED cultivation cabinets; and manufacture and sale of prefabricated precast costruction components. Glory Flame Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

8128.HK.long_name: China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited
8128.HK.summary: China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, exploration, and development of geothermal energy as alternative energy for building heating in Mainland China. The company operates through four segments: Shallow Geothermal Energy, Air Conditioning/Shallow Geothermal Heat Pump, Properties Investment and Development, and Securities Investment and Trading. The Shallow Geothermal Energy segment engages in the provision, installation, and maintenance of shallow geothermal energy utilization systems. The Air Conditioning/Shallow Geothermal Heat Pump segment trades in air conditioning/shallow geothermal heat pump products. The Properties Investment and Development segment invests in properties for rental income. The Securities Investment and Trading segment engages in the trading of securities and other types of investments. China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited also provides property management and technical support services; and installs energy systems. The company was formerly known as China Ground Source Energy Industry Group Limited and changed its name to China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited in May 2018. China Geothermal Industry Development Group Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8208.HK.summary: WMCH Global Investment Limited, an investment holding company, provides civil and structural engineering consultancy services to infrastructural, residential, industrial, commercial, and institutional projects in Singapore, Vietnam, and internationally. The company also offers master planning, structural due diligence, and visual inspection services to existing buildings. In addition, it provides geotechnical engineering consultancy services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in North Point, Hong Kong. WMCH Global Investment Limited is a subsidiary of WMCH Global Holdings Limited.

8216.HK.summary: Maxicity Holdings Limited operates as a slope work contractor in Hong Kong. It undertakes drilling and installation of soil nails; construction of retaining walls; installation of debris flow protection rigid barriers; construction of flexible barrier systems; installation of raking drains; installation of wire meshes and mats for erosion control; construction of concrete maintenance stairways/access systems; and landscape softworks and establishment works. The company also engages in reinforcement bar fixing, concreting formwork and concreting, and general civil works subcontracting activities. It serves public and private sector projects construction contractors. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Mongkok, Hong Kong.

8217.HK.summary: Luen Wong Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a subcontractor in civil engineering works in Hong Kong. It undertakes civil engineering works, including roads and drainage works, such as construction and improvement of local road, carriageway with junction improvement, and the associated footpaths, planting areas, drains, sewers, water mains, and utilities diversion; structural works comprises of construction of reinforced concrete structures for bridges and retaining walls; and site formation works consisting of excavation and/or filling works for forming a new site and achieving designed formation level for later development. The company also provides decoration and renovation works. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8275.HK.summary: Beaver Group (Holding) Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides foundation work and ancillary services in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes bored piling and other foundation works. It also offers management services for construction works; and machinery rental and leasing services. Beaver Group (Holding) Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.

8431.HK.summary: Hao Bai International (Cayman) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, procurement, and installation of water circulation systems in Hong Kong and Macau. It operates through Management Contracting Services, Consultancy Services, and Maintenance Services segments. The company's water circulation systems include swimming pools, water fountains, water curtains, etc. It also offers consulting, maintenance, and repair services for water circulation systems. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Hao Bai International (Cayman) Limited is a subsidiary of Harmony Asia international Limited.

8460.HK.summary: Basetrophy Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a substructure subcontractor in Hong Kong. It engages in the provision of foundation and site formation works, including ELS works, sheet piling, pipe piling, pre-boring, pre-bored H-piling, mini-piling, and bored piling; and other geotechnical engineering works, such as slope works and other minor geotechnical works. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in San Po Kong, Hong Kong. Basetrophy Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Brightly Ahead Limited.

8516.HK.summary: Grand Talents Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of civil engineering construction works of road and highway related infrastructures in Hong Kong. It also undertakes repair and maintenance projects for roads and highways, and other infrastructures, such as construction of pavilion and seawall; and construction projects for barrier-free access facilities and drainage systems. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

8523.HK.summary: Sheung Moon Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the business of civil engineering construction works in Hong Kong. The company undertakes site formation works, road and drainage works, and structural works for public and private sectors. It also holds properties. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Sheung Moon Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Chrysler Investments Limited.

8532.HK.summary: Polyfair Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong. It designs and provides faÃ§ade systems and curtain wall work solutions for residential and commercial buildings. The company offers various design and build services for various projects, such as developing designs, conducting structural calculations, preparing shop drawings, sourcing and procuring building materials, arranging for building material logistics and installation works, project management, and post-project completion services. It serves property developers and contractors from the private sector. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. Polyfair Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of C.N.Y. Holdings Limited.

8601.HK.summary: Boltek Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides engineering consultancy services with a focus on the field of infrastructure developments in Hong Kong. The company offers engineering consultancy services comprising civil engineering services, such as road and structural engineering; geotechnical engineering; and traffic engineering. Its engineering consultant services for infrastructure works include roads, bridges, noise barriers, barrier-free access facilities, slope improvement, foundation works, drainage, and river walls. Boltek Holdings Limited also provides ancillary services, which comprise deployment of engineering and related staff to government authority by recruiting, employing, and remunerating individuals on contract basis; and advisory services on the implementation of contract administration procedures in infrastructure development project. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. Boltek Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Waywin Investment Holding Limited.

8616.HK.summary: Sunray Engineering Group Limited offers building protection solutions in Hong Kong and Macau. The company undertakes waterproofing, flooring, and joint sealant works for residential and commercial buildings, and community facilities in public and private sectors. It also supplies building protection products, including waterproofing products, tiling products, and flooring and other products. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Cheung Sha Wan, Hong Kong. Sunray Engineering Group Limited is a subsidiary of Ultra Success Industries Limited.

BDG.F.long_name: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited
BDG.F.summary: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various services for infrastructure construction. The company operates through two segments, Design, Survey, and Consultancy; and Construction Contracting. The company offers design, surveying and mapping, monitoring, and consulting services for engineering of urban rail transit, industrial and civil construction, and municipal engineering projects; and construction contracting services related to urban rail transit and the service concession arrangements under the build-operate-transfer arrangements. It also provides engineering consulting, monitoring, and testing services, as well as development services; technical consulting and technical services; advisory services; and investment management services. In addition, the company is involved in property management; and construction project investment, construction, and operation maintenance activities, as well as railway operation management. It has operations in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as Beijing Urban Construction Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited in October 2013. Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited was founded in 1958 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

CCOHF.long_name: China State Construction International Holdings Limited
CCOHF.summary: China State Construction International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Macau, and internationally. It constructs public and private housings; buildings for the government and other institutions; commercial and industrial buildings, and hotels; and other building projects. The company also operates as a contractor in civil engineering works comprising general roads and drainage works, site formation, port works/reclamation, water and sewage treatment plants, bridges construction, tunnels, waterworks, and other special-function civil projects for the government. In addition, it is involved in undertaking foundation projects for the housing authority and private property developers; electrical and mechanical works for the government and semi-government bodies; and other subcontracted works, as well as site investigation, concrete production, and pre-casting activities. Further, the company provides insurance brokerage, project and construction management, project consultancy, and logistic services; designs, manufactures, and installs curtain walls, aluminum windows, and other related products; sells and distributes construction materials; issues guaranteed notes, as well as leases plant and machinery; generates and supplies heat and electricity; and manufactures and sells precast structures. Additionally, it engages in the marine engineering works and property investment activities; and infrastructure operation and investment, thermoelectricity, toll road operation, and property development and facade contracting businesses. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. China State Construction International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of China Overseas Holdings Limited.

CCOHY.long_name: China State Construction International Holdings Limited
CCOHY.summary: China State Construction International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Macau, and internationally. It constructs public and private housings; buildings for the government and other institutions; commercial and industrial buildings, and hotels; and other building projects. The company also operates as a contractor in civil engineering works comprising general roads and drainage works, site formation, port works/reclamation, water and sewage treatment plants, bridges construction, tunnels, waterworks, and other special-function civil projects for the government. In addition, it is involved in undertaking foundation projects for the housing authority and private property developers; electrical and mechanical works for the government and semi-government bodies; and other subcontracted works, as well as site investigation, concrete production, and pre-casting activities. Further, the company provides insurance brokerage, project and construction management, project consultancy, and logistic services; designs, manufactures, and installs curtain walls, aluminum windows, and other related products; sells and distributes construction materials; issues guaranteed notes, as well as leases plant and machinery; generates and supplies heat and electricity; and manufactures and sells precast structures. Additionally, it engages in the marine engineering works and property investment activities; and infrastructure operation and investment, thermoelectricity, toll road operation, and property development and facade contracting businesses. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. China State Construction International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of China Overseas Holdings Limited.

CRWOF.summary: China Railway Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated construction company in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and Macau. Its Infrastructure Construction segment constructs railways, highways, bridges, tunnels, metropolitan railways, buildings, irrigation works, hydroelectricity projects, ports, docks, airports, and other municipal works. The company's Survey, Design and Consulting Services segment provides survey, design, consulting, research and development, feasibility study, and compliance certification services to infrastructure construction projects. Its Engineering Equipment and Component Manufacturing segment designs, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells turnouts, bridge steel structures, and other railway related equipment, engineering machinery, and materials. The company's Property Development segment develops, sells, and manages residential and commercial properties. Its Other Businesses segment is involved in mining, financial, service concession arrangements operation, merchandise trading, and other ancillary businesses. China Railway Group Limited was founded in 1950 and is based in Beijing, China.

CRWOY.summary: China Railway Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated construction company in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and Macau. Its Infrastructure Construction segment constructs railways, highways, bridges, tunnels, metropolitan railways, buildings, irrigation works, hydroelectricity projects, ports, docks, airports, and other municipal works. The company's Survey, Design and Consulting Services segment provides survey, design, consulting, research and development, feasibility study, and compliance certification services to infrastructure construction projects. Its Engineering Equipment and Component Manufacturing segment designs, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells turnouts, bridge steel structures, and other railway related equipment, engineering machinery, and materials. The company's Property Development segment develops, sells, and manages residential and commercial properties. Its Other Businesses segment is involved in mining, financial, service concession arrangements operation, merchandise trading, and other ancillary businesses. China Railway Group Limited was founded in 1950 and is based in Beijing, China.

ETIHY.summary: Earthasia International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides landscape architecture services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates through three segments: Landscape Design, The Catering Business Focuses on the Operation of Restaurants, and Manufacture and Sale of Graphene Products. The company undertakes the residential development, infrastructure and public open space, commercial and mixed-use development, and tourism and hotel projects, as well as provides landscape design, master planning, and urban design services. It also provides design development and drawing support, and interior design services; invests in food industry; and operates restaurants in Mainland China and Italy. In addition, the company manufactures and sells of graphene product. It offers landscape architecture services to governments, public bodies, private property developers, state-owned property developers, town planning companies, architecture companies, and engineering companies. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

LOUIF.summary: South Shore Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the hospitality, entertainment, and construction businesses in Hong Kong, Macau, Singapore, and Malaysia. It operates through Management Contracting, Property Development Management, Property Investment, and Hotel Operation segments. The Management Contracting segment offers building construction and civil engineering services. The Property Development Management segment develops and manages projects, as well as provides facilities and asset management services. The Property Investment segment invests in properties. The Hotel Operation segment operates hotels with ancillary facilities. The company also offers electrical, mechanical, and building services, as well as finance, interior decoration and foundation works, and management and secretarial services. In addition, it is involved in the trade and letting of plant and machinery; and trade and installation of building materials. The company was formerly known as The 13 Holdings Limited and changed its name to South Shore Holdings Limited in June 2018. South Shore Holdings Limited was founded in 1946 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

NWSGY.summary: NWS Holdings Limited engages in infrastructure and services businesses in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and internationally. The company operates through Roads, Aviation, Construction, Insurance, Environment, Logistics, Facilities Management, Transport, and Strategic Investments segments. It operates roads and related projects; and power plants. The company invests in a logistics center in Hong Kong with a total leasable area of approximately 5.9 million square feet. In addition, it leases commercial aircrafts; and provides life insurance products and services. Further, it provides facilities management services, including property investment, operation, marketing, promotion, and management of the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre; and retails duty free tobacco, liquor, perfume, cosmetics, package food, and general merchandise. Additionally, the company is involved in the construction of various projects; provision of ferry, franchised and non-franchised bus, information technology, property agency, management, consultancy, financing, carpark management, and management consultation services, as well as piling, ground investigation, and civil engineering services; operation of toll roads; and foundation work activities. The company was formerly known as Pacific Ports Co Limited and changed its name to NWS Holdings Limited in January 2003. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. NWS Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of New World Development Company Limited.

PYWA.F.summary: PYI Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, develops and invests in ports and infrastructure in the Yangtze River region of the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company operates through Paul Y. Engineering Group, Ports Development, Ports and Logistics, Property, Securities, and Treasury segments. The Paul Y. Engineering Group segment is involved in building construction, civil engineering, development and project management, facilities and asset management, and property investment activities. The Ports Development segment develops ports facilities and ports related properties. The Ports and Logistics segment owns and operates ports and logistics facilities in the Yangtze River region of China; liquefied petroleum gas terminals and storage-tank farm; and automotive compressed natural gas fueling stations. The Property segment develops, invests, sells, and leases real estate properties and developed lands, and land and projects under development. The Securities segment invests and trades in securities. The Treasury segment provides credit and cash management services. PYI Corporation Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

WKH.F.summary: Wai Kee Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates in the construction and infrastructure industry in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Construction, Sewage Treatment and Steam Fuel; Construction Materials; Quarrying; and Property Development and Investment, Toll Road, Investment and Asset Management segments. It primarily provides construction services for civil engineering and building projects; and operates sewage treatment and steam fuel plants. The company also produces and sells concrete; and quarry products. In addition, it engages in manufacturing, trading, delivering, and laying asphalt. Further, the company is involved in the provision of financial and transportation, marine engineering and construction, and environmental engineering, as well as fitting out, improvement, and alteration works for buildings; and deals in securities and advising on securities. Wai Kee Holdings Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.
